description:
An oil and gas funded group had the most registered meetings with government ministers among all think tanks last year, DeSmog can reveal. Onward describes itself as a think tank bringing “bold and practical ideas for the centre right”. Since its launch in 2018 it has gone through a meteoric rise, quickly becoming one of […]

The post BP and Shell Funded Group Was Sunak Government’s Most Popular Think Tank in 2023 appeared first on DeSmog.
title: BP and Shell Funded Group Was Sunak Government’s Most Popular Think Tank in 2023
